dublin_core.dcvalue: The purpose of our study was to develop a generic reference model for home telecare in a digital television environment and to suggest how it might be deployed at a test village We describe here an architecture based on digital video broadcast standards its components services and required additional technical solutions to provide a unified home telecare solution We also suggest different user groups within the village context and possible service scenarios for them We conclude that in general digital television provides a potentially flexible and promising platform for home telecare services
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-12T11:44:57Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2003-03-10
Telemedicine journal and e-health : the official journal of the American Telemedicine Association
Proposed model of a digital video-based home telecare system.
